description: This file contains internal function prototypes and macro definitions for the CCSP_NAMESPACE_MGR_OBJECT component in the CCSP platform. It declares functions for managing component namespaces, including registering, unregistering, discovering, and retrieving namespace information.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrGetCountOfRegNamespace
methods.description: Returns the count of registered namespaces.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrLookforComponent
methods.description: Looks up a component by name.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrRegisterNamespaces
methods.description: Registers multiple namespaces for a component.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrBuildNamespaces
methods.description: Builds namespace data structures for a component.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrUnregisterNamespace
methods.description: Unregisters a namespace for a component.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrCheckNamespaceDataType
methods.description: Checks if the namespace data type matches the expected data type.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrGetRegisteredComponents
methods.description: Retrieves the list of registered components.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrGetNamespaceByComponent
methods.description: Retrieves namespace information associated with a component.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrCleanAll
methods.description: Cleans or resets all namespace manager data.

methods.name: CcspNsMgrDumpObject
methods.description: Dumps internal state of namespace manager for debugging.
